attributes.action: Give Recognition for Significant Workers During Lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
We call on the UK Government to formally recognise the invaluable support given by these significant individuals when we emerge, as we will, from this National crisis.

For example: care workers, police, fire service, NHS volunteers, charity workers, postmen, transport workers, bin men, delivery drivers, armed forces etc.
attributes.background: As well as appreciating the excellent staff working at all levels within the NHS; recognition should also be given to other workers currently putting their own lives at risk dealing with the public, keeping services running during Lockdown; enabling the majority of us to stay home and stay safe.

rejection.details:

Identify and reward all key workers due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903

A medal to honour the fortitude of people working in essential occupations: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308035
